title: Get a WAIFU and a Wireless Keyboard!!! - NuPhy Air75

The Nuphy Air75 is a customizable hot-swappable keyboard that works with PCs, Macs, and almost anything in between especially since it's wireless. Check out the keyboard and find new love while you're at it.
